Text: MRI Informationpst Chris Thanks again for taking a few moments to speak with me We appreciate you letting us help you out in preparing for your impending life after Enron Please dont be overwhelmed by the detail we ask for in the forms The reason we ask for such detail is that this information along with your resume and any verbal help you can offer is what we will use in preparing a marketing presentation for whichever suitors you choose We take this information work with you to promote your most attractive professional assets and hope to create a bidding war for your services With the quality of people that are in the market right now most of whom you know andor used to work with we are finding that some companies will even make an opening for the right person with the right track record Your ability to create million last year while working under Enrons credit issues will speak highly of you I am sure that we will find you a new position when you are ready At MRI we are growing our credibility and increasing our options with every placement be sure to thank the guys you know that we have placed when we get you a better position than what they have In addition to this information we also need you to put together a list of companies as many as you can think of that you would like to work for and a list of references Im sure Al told you most of that but I just wanted make sure Dont put yourself under too much pressure to get that stuff done completely well work through whatever you want clarified over the phone If you have any questions at all please dont hesitate to call me at You can also email me at Thanks again for letting us help you out Sincerely Jeff Keene MRI Stationarygif CAREER DEVELOPMENT WORKSHEETmasterdoc past achievementsdoc
